sections.heading: 01|Road grade above or below railroad tracks
sections.text: Effective:October 1, 1953Latest Legislation:House Bill 1 - 100th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAny county may raise or lower the grade of any state or intercounty highway above or below the tracks of railroads and parallel and adjacent int

sections.heading: the Revised Code shall apply to the notice  provided for in this section, and to all claims for damages by  reason of such improvement
sections.text: Such claims shall be filed with the county auditor within the time, and rights thereunder shall pass to vendees, as provided in such section. After the expiration
